<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Send message to given address using UDP protocol. Returns false if the message has not been delivered 

Note: Not implemented (see talk page for more info).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sendUDPMessage''' [ip, port, message]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ip: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> port: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> message: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_bool <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''sendUDPMessage''' ["192.168.0.1", 2302, "Here goes you message..."]; </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[sendAUMessage]]
</value></part></template>
